name: tape-results
description: Get the tap output from the browser to your console, and exit with an appropriate exit code

scripts.pretest: browserify test/src/fail.js -d -o test/serve/fail-bundle.js && browserify test/src/pass.js -d -o test/serve/pass-bundle.js
scripts.test: node test/server.js pass.html && (node test/server.js fail.html && exit 1 || exit 0)
